text: dreadful to hear , captain nemo was even more dreadful to see . his face was pale from some spasm of his heart , which must have stopped beating for an instant . his pupils were hideously contracted . his voice was no longer speaking , it was bellowing . bending from the waist , he shook the canadian by the shoulders .
here , carter , help him on with his waist - coat .
without speaking , without smiling , without seeming to recognise in me a human being , he only twined my waist with his arm and riveted me to his side .
